rules.natural: If the research team progresses their research on the plant extract, then the research team does not discover applications for the compound.
Either the research team progresses their research on the plant extract, or if the research team initiates research on the plant extract, then the research team publishes a paper on their findings.

rules.prover9_expression: (consults_experts(Company, Botanists) -> (-(progresses_research(Team, PlantExtract) -> discovers_applications(Team, Compound)) -> designs_process(Engineers, Manufacturing)))
rules.natural: If the company consults with botanical experts, then provided that the progression of research on the plant extract does not lead to the discovery of applications for the compound, the engineers design a manufacturing process.
Either the company consults with botanical experts or the company hires chemistry consultants.

rules.prover9_expression: (hires_consultants(Company, Chemists) -> (-(progresses_research(Team, PlantExtract) -> discovers_applications(Team, Compound)) -> designs_process(Engineers, Manufacturing)))
rules.natural: If the company hires chemistry consultants, then under the condition that progress in plant extract research fails to result in compound application discoveries, the engineers design a manufacturing process.
Either the engineers develop prototype equipment or the engineers modify the equipment design.
If the engineers modify the equipment design, then the compound enters the market for consumers.
If the quality team investigates equipment issues, then the factory does not halt production of the compound.
If the company holds a patent on the compound, then should the compound not enter the market for consumers, the research project receives funding from the government.

rules.prover9_expression: (conducts_audit(Compliance, Factory) -> (-(develops_prototype(Engineers, Equipment) -> enters_market(Compound, Consumers)) -> investigates_issues(QualityTeam, Equipment)))
rules.natural: If the compliance department conducts an audit of the factory, then provided that prototype equipment development does not lead to market entry for the compound, the quality team investigates equipment issues.
Either the compliance department conducts an audit of the factory or the quality team reviews manufacturing processes.

rules.prover9_expression: (monitors_compliance(Regulator, Company) -> (reviews_processes(QualityTeam, Manufacturing) -> (-(develops_prototype(Engineers, Equipment) -> enters_market(Compound, Consumers)) -> investigates_issues(QualityTeam, Equipment))))
rules.natural: If the regulator monitors the company's compliance, then when the quality team reviews manufacturing processes and prototype equipment development does not lead to market entry for the compound, the quality team investigates equipment issues.
Either the company establishes a plant crop farm or the company does not secure a supply of plant material.
If the company faces shortages of plant material, then the research team does not progress their research on the plant extract.
If the company finds an alternative supplier, then the research team does not progress their research on the plant extract.

If management approves the sourcing from a supplier, then either the company negotiates a contract with a supplier, or the company faces shortages of plant material, or the company finds an alternative supplier.
Either management approves the sourcing from a supplier or procurement authorizes the purchase of plant material.

If procurement authorizes the purchase of plant material, then either the company negotiates a contract with a supplier, or the company faces shortages of plant material, or the company finds an alternative supplier.
Either the compound passes toxicity testing or the compound passes efficacy trials.
If management forms a cross-functional task force, then the task force implements a solution in manufacturing.
If the task force implements a solution in manufacturing, then management does not escalate the issue to the engineers.
If the compound passes efficacy trials, then the compound enters the market for consumers.
If the company submits an application to the FDA for the compound, then when the compound passes toxicity testing, the compound enters the market for consumers.
If the FDA grants approval for the compound, then provided that the compound passes toxicity testing, the compound enters the market for consumers.
If the laboratory synthesizes the plant extract into a compound, then the laboratory identifies the active ingredient in the plant extract.
If the laboratory synthesizes the plant extract into a compound, then the laboratory does not identify the active ingredient in the plant extract.

rules.prover9_expression: (synthesizes(Lab, PlantExtract, Compound) | (submits_application(Company, FDA, Compound) | receives_approval(FDA, Compound)))
rules.natural: Either the laboratory synthesizes the plant extract into a compound, or the company submits an application to the FDA for the compound, or the FDA grants approval for the compound.
If the research team initiates research on the plant extract, then the company secures a supply of plant material.
If progress in plant extract research does not lead to the discovery of applications for the compound, then the engineers do not design a manufacturing process.
If prototype equipment development does not lead to market entry for the compound, then the factory halts production of the compound.

rules.prover9_expression: (-(-(progresses_research(Team, PlantExtract) -> discovers_applications(Team, Compound)) -> designs_process(Engineers, Manufacturing)) -> escalates_issue(Management, Engineers))
rules.natural: If the failure of research progress to yield compound applications does not result in manufacturing process design, then management escalates the issue to the engineers.

rules.prover9_expression: (-(-(progresses_research(Team, PlantExtract) -> discovers_applications(Team, Compound)) -> designs_process(Engineers, Manufacturing)) -> forms_taskforce(Management, CrossFunctional))
rules.natural: If the failure of research progress to yield compound applications does not result in manufacturing process design, then management forms a cross-functional task force.
If the compound does not enter the market for consumers, then the research team initiates research on the plant extract.
If the compound does not enter the market for consumers, then the research project does not receive funding from the government.
